author: hsiaowei
content:
Consensus layer specs `v1.3.0-rc.1` -- **Alpine Ibex** -- released! 

https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/releases/tag/v1.3.0-rc.1

This release contains one critical breaking change -- use of `GENESIS_FORK_VERSION` in signing `BLSToExecutionChange` messages.

And for EIP-4844, it contains a bugfix for `upgrade_to_eip4844` helper.

Thank the client teams for the bug reports!
